rows.label: qst106003_msg0001
rows.name:
First, go and collect
the Golden Cogs, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0002
rows.name:
This is just the beginning, mo.
Let's get it done quickly, mo!

rows.label: qst106003_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm currently preparing
for the modification, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0102
rows.name:
Don't worry about me, I want you
to go ahead with the outfit, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0201
rows.name:
Have you gathered the
materials for the outfit, mo?

rows.label: qst106003_msg0202
rows.name: Please give them to Kiku, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0301
rows.name:
Now, go to the Goldmund
Flight Deck in Avaritia and
speak to Fuwafuwa-san, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0302
rows.name:
Enroll in a trial day at Bluesky
Nopon University and acquire
various forms of culture, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0303
rows.name:
By doing so, Hana will... earn
the right to be modified, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0304
rows.name:
Enrolling in the university is the
most important thing of all, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0401
rows.name:
The preparations for Hana's
modification are perfect, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0402
rows.name:
All that's left is for the energy
in that charging device to be
full, then we'll proceed, mo.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0403
rows.name:
The quickest way is probably
to use the mercenary group
to collect E-Packs, mo.
